forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 68F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms during the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy skies with scattered thunderstorms before midnight. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 31F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low -1C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
